In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Glorious Martyr, St. Lawrence, we come to you in humility as we see your greatness and your power of intercession with God. You were so strong in your faith that you readily suffered tortures from the pagans and died a cruel death, becoming an outstanding witness to Christ and His Church. Encouraged by your strong faith, we believe in your powerful patronage and pray that you obtain for us a living faith, an unwavering hope, and love of God and of our neighbor. Help us in all our needs especially for (mention request here‚Ä¶) Keep us pure and chaste. Make us obedient to our elders. Help us to help the poor, the downtrodden, the sick and those in trials and difficulties. Touch the tepid Christians and enkindle in them the fire of faith, and give the non-Christians the grace of faith in Christ. As the pagans were moved by your faith in Jesus Christ, so may your immortal faith make the unbelievers embrace the true faith, that the Kingdom of God may flourish. Assist us always to overcome our trials and temptations. Grant that we may always live a true Christian life and finally be victorious in the battle of faith, that being true witnesses to Christ we may die in Him to join you and all the saints and live for all eternity in His Kingdom, to praise God forever and ever. Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St Lawrence, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
